brand_identity.name: Bohania Renault - CR Appointment System
brand_identity.core_philosophy: Function is beauty. Grid is law. No decoration without purpose.

usage.headings: Use Archivo for all page titles and section headers. Always uppercase for H1/H2.
usage.body: Use Manrope for all general text, descriptions, and form labels.
usage.data: Use JetBrains Mono for dates, times, VIN numbers, and appointment IDs.

status_indicators.description: Since color is forbidden for status, use shape and contrast.

layout.container: w-full max-w-[1920px] mx-auto p-4 md:p-6 lg:p-8

structure.sidebar: Fixed width (280px) or Collapsible. High contrast border-r.
structure.header: Minimal height (64px). Sticky. Border-b. White bg/80 backdrop blur.

shadcn_customization.radius: rounded-sm (0.125rem) or rounded-none. NO LARGE ROUNDED CORNERS.
shadcn_customization.shadows: shadow-none or shadow-sm. Use borders for separation.
shadcn_customization.borders: border-gray-200. Focus states must use border-black.
shadcn_customization.cards: Flat, 1px border. No elevation shadows. Hover: border-gray-400 transition-colors.

buttons.primary: bg-black text-white hover:bg-gray-800 rounded-sm font-mono text-xs uppercase tracking-wider
buttons.secondary: bg-white text-black border border-gray-200 hover:bg-gray-50 rounded-sm font-mono text-xs uppercase tracking-wider

inputs.style: bg-white border-gray-200 focus:border-black focus:ring-0 rounded-sm font-medium
inputs.label: uppercase text-[10px] font-bold tracking-widest text-gray-500 mb-1.5

tables.header: border-b border-black text-black font-bold uppercase text-xs tracking-wider

calendar_appointment_card.style: bg-white border-l-4 p-3 mb-2 shadow-sm hover:translate-x-1 transition-transform cursor-pointer

visual_enhancers.textures: Use subtle noise/grain on the dashboard background to reduce sterility.
visual_enhancers.empty_states: Do not use illustrations. Use ASCII art or a simple, large geometric shape (like a wireframe box) with centered monospaced text.
visual_enhancers.icons: Lucide React. Stroke width: 1.5px (Fine) or 2px (Medium). DO NOT use filled icons except for specific status indicators.

motion.interaction: Buttons scale down slightly (0.98) on click.

instructions_to_main_agent: STRICT MONOCHROME: If you add color (blue, red, green), you FAIL. Status must be conveyed via form/shape/shade.
FONT LOADING: Ensure Archivo, Manrope, and JetBrains Mono are imported via Google Fonts in index.html or CSS.
GRID BORDERS: In the dashboard, consider using 'divide-x divide-y divide-gray-200' for a structured, table-like grid view.
DENSITY: This is a tool for pros. Don't waste space. Use tight spacing in tables and lists.
DATA-TESTID: Every interactive element must have a data-testid attribute.
ROLE-BASED UI: Ensure the 'New Appointment' button is prominent for Receptionist/CRE, but Settings is hidden/disabled.
OVERRIDE SHADCN: The default Shadcn radius is 0.5rem. Change it to 0.125rem or 0 in the theme config or utility classes.
universal_guidelines: Do not use generic centered layouts.
Create depth through layered z-index, not shadows.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable in layout containers, but tight spacing in data tables.
Don't use AI assistant Emoji characters.
